title: Mathematics Education Module Design Using Integrated Content Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Core Middle School Mathematics Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthens mathematical problem-solving competencies through theory-practice integrated modules in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematics education modules by applying the three stages (concept-instruction-educational design) of the IMA-CID model.
Learners can develop content models that integrate mathematical concepts into real-world cases in project-based assignments.
Learners can design dynamic mathematics content specifications that support open learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
